user.title: Set up ChoreBot
user.description:
ChoreBot provides advanced task management with recurring tasks, streak tracking, and optional cloud sync.

Select a sync backend to enable cloud backup and cross-device synchronization, or choose None to use ChoreBot locally.

data_description.sync_backend: Choose TickTick for cloud sync or None for local-only operation

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance of ChoreBot is allowed
